title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 13365 on Ford F-150
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13365 Class 3 trailer hitch on a 2008 Ford F-150.

Install Sheet: 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13365/installsheet/CM_13365_INS.PDF

No drilling required.


Application Coverage:
2006 - 2008 Ford F-150 Except without factory Hitch
2006 - 2008 Lincoln LT

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, Ford F150, F-150, curt 13365
